name: Shaull Almagor
content: Home - Shaull Almagor I am an assistant professor at the Computer Science department at the Technion. Until 2021, I was a Marie Curie Fellow. Prior to that, I was a postdoc at Oxford University under the supervision of Prof. Joël Ouaknine. Interested in working with me?  contact me /   check out my publications    /   join my course  /   watch my YouTube videos. My research is funded in part by the Israeli Science Foundation (ISF) grant “Determinization of Quantitative Computational Models”. Research Interests: Formal Methods Automata Weighted Automata Symmetry Linear Dynamical Systems Logic Algorithmic Game Theory Robotic Planning Contact Information: Email: shaull_at_technion.ac.il Office:  635 Address: CS Taub Building, Technion, Haifa, Israel 3200003 Phone:  073-378-4322  (+972-4-829-4322) Skip to content
